about_the_game:
Mina is an action-adventure game developed and published by Anopia Games, offering immersive gameplay and a deeply woven narrative. Players step into the role of Koray, a psychiatrist investigating his patient Kagan’s claim that their worlds are simulations. During this journey of discovery, they cross paths with Mina, who once tried—but ultimately failed—to escape the simulation.

Story

  • Koray initially meets Kagan’s belief that their worlds are simulations with skepticism. However, through his sessions with Kagan and the journeys they undertake together, he begins to question whether Kagan’s claim might actually be true. During this process, they encounter Mina—who has previously attempted (and failed) to escape the simulation, leading to her punishment. Mina’s traumatic past and her sensitivity to social injustice add depth to the storyline. In certain chapters, players will take control of Mina herself, experiencing events from her perspective.

  • Far from being a mere escape tale, Mina is an experience that grapples with profound philosophical questions, addresses social issues, and is shaped by the player’s choices.

Gameplay Features

  • Third-Person Perspective (TPS): Explore a detailed world that offers a cinematic experience.

  • Dual-Perspective Narrative: Primarily guide Koray, but in select segments, step into Mina’s shoes to see events from a different angle.

  • Rich Story and Deep Characters: Uncover each character’s hidden secrets as you seek out the truth.

  • Choices and Consequences: Your decisions can bring you closer to—or drive you away from—God!

  • Puzzle and Exploration Mechanics: Locate hidden clues, piece together lost memories, and untangle the knots in Koray’s mind.

  • Psychological Thriller Elements: Walk the fine line between reality and delusion.

Atmosphere and Themes

  • Psychological Thriller: A thought-provoking narrative that urges you to question reality.

  • Mystery and Manipulation: How much can you really trust what you see?

  • Deep Character Backstories: Explore the shattered memories of both Koray and Mina.

  • Mind Games and Hallucinations: Not everything you see is as it appears.

Why Mina?

If you’ve enjoyed games like Alan Wake, Silent Hill, Heavy Rain, or Hellblade, Mina will take you on a journey that tests you both emotionally and psychologically. As you wrestle with your own mind, a new mystery awaits around every corner.

Do you want reality—or just another story? Make your choice… But remember, every choice comes at a price.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K veya AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 Ti or equivalent AMD GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K veya AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or equivalent AMD GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Mina is a psychological thriller and story-driven TPS about psychiatrist Koray and patient Kagan investigating whether their world is a simulation. Players also experience Mina’s traumatic past and her attempts to escape, shaping the narrative through their choices.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
